message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000.  Let's make this deal happen!
